titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 27, 1972, to delete the Fountain Avenue landfill from the boundary of Gateway National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 11/17/1987--Introduced. Modifies the boundary of the Gateway National Recreation Area in New York and New Jersey to exclude the Fountain Avenue landfill site. Provides for the disposal of the excluded Federal lands, waters, and interest and the development of methane gas from such site.
